EmailTemplate.subject: Sign up to The Challenge Graduate Action Team NOW for Summer 2014!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Wish you could do NCS with The Challenge again this summer? Then sign up to this…
The Challenge: Graduate Action Team
What is the opportunity?
You will join a group of 15 Challenge Graduates and go on a team building day on Saturday 5th July at Warwick Castle Your team will then meet every week for 5 weeks to design a social action project for a chosen community partner Your team will be invited to exclusive workshops to help you make your project a success Within the team, you can choose to specialise in:
· Fundraising – organise an event to raise money · Social Action – introduce new ideas/an event for the partner · Campaigning – create a campaign about a topic relevant to the partner 5. Project dates: 5th July-11th August (one meeting per week - meeting day/time flexible)
Where are the teams based?
· One team of 15 graduates in Leamington
· One team of 15 graduates in Nuneaton
What’s in it for you?
Gain project management and leadership experience Enhance your CV/record of achievement/UCAS Gain the Challenge with Distinction award Attend exclusive workshops run by leading experts in the subject Meet new people and do something amazing for your community
How much will this cost?
The programme is FREE: we just ask that you are passionate about making a difference in your community. Sign up is first come first served – so get in touch ASAP.
Email Katy at katy.massey@the-challenge.org to sign up or for more info.
